definition: to investigate
surname Zha
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: The postman is making the rounds of houses to find out to whom the letter belongs.
sentences.chinese: 邮递员一家一家地查访，想找到收信人。

sentences.english: The policeman went among the villagers in disguise and saw if there were straws in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 警察穿着便衣到村民中查访，看看是否有蛛丝马迹。

sentences.english: Follow-up factory visits are necessary to ensure corrective actions are taken.
sentences.chinese: 有必要对工厂进行追踪查访，以确保纠正措施的落实。
